Package icyllis.arc3d.core

Interface RefCounted

All Known Subinterfaces:
IGpuSurface, ISurface
All Known Implementing Classes:
Attachment, Context, CpuBuffer, Device, DirectContext, GLAttachment, GLBuffer, GLProgram, GLRenderTarget, GLRenderTexture, GLSampler, GLTexture, GLUniformBuffer, GLUniformDataManager, GLVertexArray, GpuBuffer, GpuRenderTarget, GpuResource, GpuTexture, Image, ManagedResource, NoPixelsDevice, OpsTask, PixelRef, RasterDevice, RasterImage, RecordingContext, RecycledResource, RefCnt, ReleaseCallback, RenderTargetProxy, RenderTask, RenderTextureProxy, Surface, SurfaceDevice, SurfaceProxy, TextureImage, TextureProxy, TextureResolveTask, UniformDataManager, VulkanBuffer, VulkanCommandPool, VulkanTexture
public interface RefCounted
Marks an object as reference-counted, behavior is implementation-dependent.
See Also:
